thread.title: VXi Corporation Delivers Cost-Effective Quality with the Envoy Office USB Headset
thread.title_full: VXi Corporation Delivers Cost-Effective Quality with the Envoy Office USB Headset - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: VXi Corporation Delivers Cost-Effective Quality with the Envoy Office USB Headset
text:
VXi’s latest offering gives office users a full-featured professional headset with a smaller price tag
Dover, N.H.
VXi Corporation announces the release of its newest office headset, the VXi Envoy Office. Designed to give office workers the benefits of a quality, yet cost-effective USB headset, the VXi Envoy Office is a solid choice for deploying along with Unified Communications solutions.
Plug into Affordable Quality
To get the full benefit of a Unified Communications solution, such as Skype for Business, users need a USB headset with professional features—and pristine sound quality. The VXi Envoy Office is designed to deliver those must-have capabilities at an affordable price. Its class-leading noise-canceling microphone eliminates 80% of distracting ambient noise. Wideband audio lets users hear and understand every word. And the Envoy Office’s convenient inline call controls (for volume, answer/end and mute) meet Skype for Business standards.
Crystal-clear HD Voice means VXi Envoy Office users get the most out of their voice recognition, video conferencing, and soft phone applications and can also enjoy hi-fi music when circumstances allow. Available in mono or stereo, the VXi Envoy Office is plug-and-play easy to use. It’s lightweight and comfortable and durable enough to stand up to every-day use. Like all of VXi’s wired headsets, the VXi Envoy Office features a two-year, hassle-free warranty.
“VXi has always provided high-quality headsets at reasonable prices,” said Mike Ferguson, president and CEO of VXi. “With the VXi Envoy Office, our aim was to give customers the best possible feature set at the best possible price. And we succeeded. Users will be very happy with how well the Envoy Office performs, even in a noisy office environment.”
Pricing & Availability
The VXi Envoy Office has an MSRP of $39.99 for the stereo version and $34.99 for the monaural. It’s available now through VXi retailers and resellers and online at Amazon.com and on the company’s website.
About VXi Corporation
VXi provides the best-performing headsets, telecommunications and speech recognition solutions for the benefit of mobile professionals, small and large businesses, and contact centers around the world. From Bluetooth® to Unified Communications, they meet the highest global standards for product quality and service, backed by the industry’s best warranties. VXi designs, markets, sells and supports their products from Dover, New Hampshire, and takes pride in delivering value, excellence and innovation. That is why VXi is The Sound Choice. Learn more at vxicorp.com.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015-vxi-corporation/envoy-office-launch/prweb12938264.htm
